name: Newangers
description:
In this demo you have 7 different vehicles and can change it on the fly. Special zones (blue stars) teleport you in another worlds.

Controls:

WASD - move, QE - strafe

Space - jump, R - anti-jump, Tab - rotate vehicle

1,2,3,4,5,6,7 - change vehicles

Left Mouse Button - throw the block, Right Mouse Button - create magic sphere

PgUp - alternative wheels axis, PgDown - normal wheels axis

P - exit game, L - restart

in special menu you can change Day/Night or Toon view (press Esc to show mouse cursor for this option)
